metadata.dc:title: Electrocardiographic alterations in accidental hypothermia
metadata.dc:creator: Gérez-Callejas, M. J
Álvarez-Prieto, L
León-Duarte, M. C
Gómez-Sáenz, J. T
Sancha-Ortuondo, G
Santamaría-Marín, J
metadata.dc:description: Accidental hypothermia is an uncommon cause of death. It has some characteristic alterations on the electrocardiogram, the most characteristic being the so-called Osborn J wave. We present a case of hypothermia, on the basis of which we make a review of its symptoms, diagnosis and treatment (AU)
metadata.dc:source: SEMERGEN, Soc. Esp. Med. Rural Gen. (Ed. Impr.);36(7): 403-405, ago.-sept. 2010. ilus
metadata.dc:title: Alteraciones electrocardiográficas en la hipotermia accidental
